title: PBE
body:
I'm sad because my friends always go on the PBE without me because I was never accepted even though I'm an ADC main and I applied right before the ADC rework and my friends always make fun of me. Plz halp meh.

EDIT: Why is it the PUBLIC Beta Envionment  if only people accepted can go on it?

replies.body: Sad to hear that you haven't been accepted just yet >.<  Once you apply to be a tester on the PBE, you are considered for all future cycles of the PBE as well.  My best advice is to be patient, as you may be accepted in the future!
Thank you for replying to this and I will try to be more patient in the future.
I think you should earn being invited to the PBE and not expect to get in for no reason other than you being lonely

> EDIT: Why is it the PUBLIC Beta Envionment  if only people accepted can go on it?

Because if everyone could play in it the servers would get overrun
